name: One Night in Deadly
description:
Play One Night in Deadly and feel the horror in the house.

Hide from the predator and get enough oxygen.

How To:

Enlarge Cams - Press the "Enlarge Cams" button

Open/Close the vent - Press the Red/Green button

Wear The Mask - Click on the Deadly-Eyes face

Open The Door - Click It

+Oxygen - Open The Door/Vent

Characters:

Vent - Deadly

Lazy - Eyes

CommsHacker

Ninja Besty

Tips:

1. If you see an Black Person on Cams, DO NOT open the vent

2. If there is a Black Out, quickly put on your Mask

3. If you hear Knocking on the Door do not open it

4. If you are running out of Oxygen open the Door/Vent

5. DO NOT do the secret ending

---------------

If there is any LAGS or GLITCHES report them here: https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/topic/495112/?page=1#post-5008521
